name: lum-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is afflicted with a major status ailment, it consumes this item to cure the ailment. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any major status ailment.
short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure any status condition or confusion.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from any status problem.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from any status problem.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from any status problem.
